title: Katie Price's son Junior warns fans sick Snapchat impostor is asking for rude pics
text:

Junior Andre has warned fans against sending pictures to a Snapchat account pretending to be him, as he revealed how an online impostor is asking for "inappropriate" snaps.

The 14-year-old son of Katie Price and Peter Andre reacted with disgust when he found out somebody is on the photo-sharing social media app masquerading as him.

Taking to his public Instagram account, Junior shared a screenshot of the fake account, which goes by the handle Junior_andre.

Over the top of it, he wrote: "I have had ppl ask me if this is me. This is not me. This person is tryna claim it's me.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

"If u r one of the ppl who have added this disgusting person then block n report him or she. Acc disgusted.

"Whoever this is..."

The teen went on: "Reason I'm so disgusted is cuz they r tryna get u to send inappropriate pictures. N also sending them back claiming to be me.

"Block n report them now if u r one of the ppl to have added them," he advised.

It comes as Junior and his 12-year-old sister Princess spend the half-term holiday with their dad Peter and his wife Emily MacDonagh, along with their baby siblings Amelia and Theo.

(Image: Instagram)

A source close to the family told Mirror Online that Junior is too "embarrassed" to stay with his mum Katie at her mucky mansion because of the mess.

"He was so embarrassed by the mess and preferred Peter's cleaner house. He is like any teenage boy and embarrasses easily so he just didn't visit the house," said the insider.

"He still saw his mum but wouldn't stay overnight because he just couldn't stand the mess.

"Junior also needed to get to school and Katie not driving meant it was more difficult to get around."

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

(Image: Instagram)

On a previous episode of Katie's reality show, My Crazy Life, Junior was seen telling off his mum for being inappropriate.

While Katie and her then-husband Kieran Hayler were clearing out two massive containers full of old stuff, Junior wasn't keen on some of the things he overheard.

As Kieran announced the container was full of "plastic" that would "have to go in the skip", Katie rubbed her body up and down, saying: "Plastic but fantastic", and Kieran squeezed her boobs.

He asked his mum: "Do any parents do that in front of their children?"

Katie asked: "Junior, what's weird?"

(Image: Instagram)

And he sarcastically responded: "Oh, yeah, it's just normal for Kieran to go up to you and then just squeeze your boobs and go honk honk honk!"

"Well, everyone squeezes my boobs," she said in her defence.

Katie was this month handed a two-year driving ban for failing to tell police who was behind the wheel of her bright pink Range Rover when it was found crashed in a hedge after a boozy night out in October 2018.

She claimed in court a mystery male friend had been driving when they crashed but had sprinted off with the car key in his pocket before police arrived.

The mum of five was cleared of drink-driving but convicted of being drunk in charge of a motor car, banned for three months and told to pay a fine.
description: Junior Andre, son of Katie Price and Peter Andre, told fans he's been targeted by someone pretending to be him for nefarious purposes
